captions.text: Although it's sad because today is the last day
today's OVEN RADIO will be filled with more contents!
Today's attendance check is in sexy version
You're not old enough for that
It's time to do anything and everything
that our fans want us to do
Let's not waste time and start right away
This is from Lee Han Duk
Can you do 'All being ugly for one'?
Let's all be ugly for Eun Ji for 3 seconds
Nam Joo is getting playful now
But everybody knows we're like this all the time
Can you do Eun Ji's lines from [Reply 1994] when she made a cameo appearance? "You look like a rockfish"
It is obvious that you look like a fish
You look like a rockfish, bad rockfish

Can Bo Mi imitate Jo In Sung from
the drama "What Happened in Bali"?
You know what scene he's talking about, right?
Could you please make some time for me?
We will be back after the commercial
Shang hai shang hai shang hai
Fans in Shang hai all have heard it
Apink's new album [Pink LUV] eats up the music chart
Only hot songs are on Apink's new album [Pink LUV]!
We're doing fan service till the very last day of
The second corner is 'Do anything if asked'
It's good that we can have variety of foods
Since we don't have enough time,
let's do it together all at once
It's good to do as many things as possible in 5 minutes
But it's really time to finish up
It's more meaningful because all six of us did it together
In particular, we didn't have a chance to communicate with our fans
Thank you so much for OVEN RADIO
We got to communicate with our fans
We will finish with the song requested by us!
Just like the title, we're sending love to fans!
Do you remember the time we spent together?
The time we had comes up to my mind sometimes
I can't believe our long past story
On the day when I'm particularly tired
There is no one on my side
I want to cry on someone's shoulder
The time when we were not afraid of anything
The days when I needed nothing
If you were next to me

Do you remember the time we spent together?
L.O.V.E (LUV)
[5minutes each day for 5days with six lovely girls!]

Is your heart still fluttering? Once it was everything
L.O.V.E (LUV)
[They were honest and unpretentious]

The time we had comes up to my mind sometimes
L.O.V.E (LUV)
[And they told fun, and exciting stories to you guys]

Can we turn back time?
[Please remember this beautiful time they spent with you forever~]
I can't believe our long past story
Thank you guys so much for being with us for 5days

title: OVEN RADIO(오븐라디오) Ep.5: Apink(에이핑크) _ LUV(러브) [ENG/JPN/CHN SUB]
